name: Lost Memories (itch) (GrumpyDredd, Snabkol, DavidBern)
description:
You stumble upon a lost phone on the sidewalk, quite surprisingly the lonesome piece of technology has the most predictable unlock code in history: 1234

Whose is it? How did it get there?
The first message exchange you read inspires worries about the owner's whereabouts.
Can you solve this mystery?

Gamejam theme: Parallel Worlds. Utilizing the theme we thought not about actual worlds; but as two parallel lives who will never coincide. The player is the protagonist and they find out about this individual who they will never meet. They are parallel.

Music by https://www.bensound.com/free-music-for-videos

Character art by Midjourney
